scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as Saint Paul, is depicted reading a book. He wears a blue tunic with gold trim and a red cloak. A halo encircles his head, and he holds a staff in his right hand. The background is a blue sky with stylized clouds and distant, abstract landscape elements. The scene is framed by a golden architectural element on the left, suggesting an interior or a framed depiction.
